meanings.definition: The state or quality of being porous.
meanings.sent1: The porousnesses of the sponge allow it to absorb water easily.
meanings.sent2: The soil's porousnesses help with drainage in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The porousnesses of the paper towel made it a terrible umbrella substitute.
meanings.sent4: The porousnesses of the rock face made it perfect for climbing.
meanings.sent5: The porousnesses of the fabric made it breathable and comfortable to wear.

meanings.definition: The ability to allow liquids or gases to pass through.
meanings.sent1: The porousnesses of the membrane make it ideal for filtration purposes.
meanings.sent2: The porousnesses of the material make it suitable for air circulation.
meanings.sent3: The porousnesses of the balloon made it deflate faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: The porousnesses of the mask allowed for easy breathing during exercise.
meanings.sent5: The porousnesses of the sponge helped in soaking up the spilled juice.
